item.description:
Non-specific usage of the tidepool API with the goal of giving it a quick smoke test so see that its is working as a clients expects. We are looking at

 - response code
 - response timing 
 - headers, specifically the x-tidepool-session and content type
 - response json data to make sure it matches our schema expectations at a high level

Verify user profile stored successfully.
